INSERT INTO TRIP_PLAN VALUES(SEQ_TRIP_PLAN.nextval,#{trip_id},#{trip_title},#{trip_area},#{trip_start_date},#{trip_end_date})
SELECT SEQ_TRIP_PLAN.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: select TP.TRIP_TITLE, TP.TRIP_ID, TM.SHARE_ID, TM.TRIP_TYPE from TRIP_PLAN TP, TRIP_MEMBER TM where TP.TRIP_NUMBER=TM.TRIP_NUMBER AND TRIP_ID=#{trip_id} AND TM.TRIP_TYPE=0
select TP.TRIP_TITLE, TP.TRIP_ID, TM.SHARE_ID, TM.TRIP_TYPE,TP.TRIP_NUMBER from TRIP_PLAN TP, TRIP_MEMBER TM where TP.TRIP_NUMBER=TM.TRIP_NUMBER AND SHARE_ID=#{trip_id} AND TM.TRIP_TYPE=0

SELECT TP.TRIP_NUMBER,TP.TRIP_ID,TP.TRIP_TITLE, TP.TRIP_AREA, TP.TRIP_START_DATE, tp.trip_end_date FROM TRIP_PLAN TP, TRIP_MEMBER TM WHERE TP.TRIP_NUMBER=TM.TRIP_NUMBER AND share_id=#{trip_id} and trip_type=1 UNION select * from TRIP_PLAN where trip_id=#{trip_id}

SELECT TP.TRIP_NUMBER, TP.TRIP_ID, TP.TRIP_TITLE, TP.TRIP_START_DATE, TP.TRIP_END_DATE,TPD.TRIP_DAY,TP.TRIP_AREA FROM TRIP_PLAN TP, TRIP_PLAN_DATE TPD WHERE TP.TRIP_NUMBER=TPD.TRIP_NUMBER AND TP.TRIP_NUMBER=#{trip_number} ORDER BY TPD.TRIP_DAY

select tc.chatting_content, to_char(tc.chatting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as chatting_date ,tc.chatting_name, tc.trip_number ,m.member_profile_picture chatting_profile from trip_chatting tc, member m where tc.chatting_name = m.Member_id and TRIP_NUMBER = #{trip_number} and chatting_date between to_CHAR((select min(chatting_date) from (select * from trip_chatting where TRIP_NUMBER = #{trip_number} order by chatting_date desc ) where RowNum <= 10), 'YYYY/MM/DD') and to_CHAR((select min(chatting_date)+1 from (select * from trip_chatting where TRIP_NUMBER = #{trip_number} order by chatting_date desc ) where RowNum <= 10)+2, 'YYYY/MM/DD') order by chatting_date asc

WITH t As( select chatting_date from trip_chatting tc, member m where tc.chatting_name = m.Member_id and TRIP_NUMBER = #{trip_number} and chatting_date between #{date} and TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') and rownum = 1 ) select * from( select tc.chatting_date from trip_chatting tc, t d where tc.chatting_date < d.chatting_date order by tc.chatting_date desc ) where rownum = 1

select tc.*, m.member_profile_picture chatting_profile from trip_chatting tc, member m where tc.chatting_name = m.Member_id and TRIP_NUMBER = #{trip_number} and chatting_date between #{date} and TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1, 'YYYY/MM/DD') order by chatting_date asc
